dc_title_s: Map of Oregon, Washington, Idaho and part of Montana.; Mitchell's Map of Oregon, Washington, Idaho and part of Montana 1876
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington. Shows roads, trails, county borders. Plate no. 93 from Mitchell's New General Atlas, Containing Maps Of The Various Countries Of The World, Plans Of Cities, Etc., Embraced In Eighty-Three Quarto Maps. At lower left: "Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1876 by S. Augustus Mitchell in the Office of the Librarian of Congress at Washington." 1 map : hand col. ; 22 x 30 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
